Commonly called owbs, or lesser owbs by more powerful owb prophets, most of these mysterious creatures focus on manipulating caligni culture. Among calignis, an owb hides from mortals they deem beneath them—even including calignis in their charge. An owb prefers to select one caligni leader to control from the shadows, manipulating them using charisma and magic. Through coersion of such agents, owbs maintain a steady hand in the politics of the community, either blessing and breaking pacts with other creatures or acting as intermediaries and ambassadors between calignis and powerful external entities. [Owb](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1257) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 196 **Perception** +13; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Caligni](/Languages.aspx?ID=28); (can't speak any languages); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15 **Str** +4 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +3 **[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)** --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +15 **Will** +13 Immunities cold **HP** 90 --- **Speed** 5 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d8+7 slashing plus 1d8 cold **Ranged** burning cold +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8 cold plus 1d8 [persistent cold](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 23, attack +15 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **3rd** [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will) - **4th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) - **5th** [Shadow Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=275), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only; to or from the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) only) **Curse of Darkness** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The owb inflicts a curse on one creature taking [persistent cold damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from their burning cold Strike, stealing the victim's vibrancy. The creature must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature gains [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22) and its coloration turns to washed out shades of gray, along with all equipment it carries, wields, or wears. These effects have an unlimited duration. Regardless of the result of its save, the creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
If the owb uses this ability on a [caligni](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=18), the curse can't be removed short of [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377) or similar powerful magic
name: Owb
